title: Grocery market share in Ireland 2019
summary: This statistic shows the distribution of Market share within the whole share Ireland on the Ireland ( Dunnes ) market as of 2019 .
Market share is one of the main measures of a Dunnes 's prosperity , and is defined as all share owned 2019 a Dunnes .
This includes , but is not limited to ; cash and balances , loans and advances to Dunnes and customers , as well debt securities .
gold: This statistic illustrates the market share of grocery stores in Ireland for the 12 weeks ending September 8 , 2019 . Dunnes held the highest market share at 22.2 percent , followed by SuperValu at 21.4 percent . The cost of food on the Irish market deflated amid lowering prices .
